definition: to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased
lit. to have only nine meals in thirty days (idiom)/fig. (of a family) on the brink of starvation/in dire straits
to praise sb in his presence
to beat a dog and bully its owner/fig. to humiliate sb indirectly by bullying a subordinate
lit. punish one, warn one hundred (idiom)/fig. to make an example of sb/also written 懲一儆百|惩一儆百[cheng2 yi1 jing3 bai3]
lit. train an army for a thousand days to use it for one morning (idiom)/fig. extensive preparation eventually pays off
pinyin: yang3 bing1 qian1 ri4 , yong4 zai4 yi1 zhao1

definition: to deserve what one gets (punishment, mishap etc) (idiom)
to solicit a bribe/to accept a bribe
erhua variant of 應名|应名[ying1 ming2]
wicker door, hole window (idiom); fig. wretched hovel/living in poverty
